Content:: Mary Larine Perera (1944-2016) is a Sri Lankan politician and a former member of the Parliament of Sri Lanka and Minister of the Wayamba Provincial Council.[1] She was married to former minister Festus Perera and Niroshan Perera is her son.  This article about a politician from North Western Province, Sri Lanka is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
